price: Gumawa Ka para sa akin ng isang magandang pagbubunyi sa mga huling [salinlahi].
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
